data_table.description: TIA/Stroke Form, Exam 4. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: TIBE23
variable.description: Sudden numbness or tingling. Since the last ARIC visit, have you had any sudden numbness, tingling, or loss of feeling on one side or your body? Q23. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]

variable.name: TIBE24
variable.description: Sudden numbness or tingling. Did the feeling of numbness or tingling occur only when you kept your arms or legs in a certain position? Q24. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]

variable.name: TIBE25
variable.description: Sudden numbness or tingling. During this time, how many episodes of numbness, tingling, or loss of sensation have you had? Q25. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]
variable.value: More than 20, or frequent, intermittent events, too numerous to count

variable.name: TIBE26
variable.description: Sudden numbness or tingling. During this same time period, when did the earliest occur? Q26. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]
variable.value: Greater than 6 months, but less than 1 year ago
Greater than 1 year, but less than 2 years ago
Greater than 2 years, but less than 3 years ago

variable.name: TIBE27
variable.description: Sudden numbness or tingling. How long did it (the longest episode) last? Q27. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]
variable.value: At least 30 seconds, but less than 1 minute
At least 1 minute, but less than 3 minutes
At least 3 minutes, but less than 1 hour
At least 1 hour, but less than 6 hours
At least 6 hours, but less than 12 hours
At least 12 hours, but less than 24 hours

variable.name: TIBE28
variable.description: Sudden numbness or tingling. Did the (worst) episode come on suddenly? Q28. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]

variable.name: TIBE28A
variable.description: Sudden numbness or tingling. How long did it take for the symptoms to get as bad as they were going to get? Q28a. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]
variable.value: At least 3 seconds, but less than 1 minute
At least 1 minute, but less than 1 hour
At least 1 hour, but less than 2 hours
At least 2 hours, but less than 24 hours

variable.name: TIBE29A
variable.description: Sudden numbness or tingling. During the (worst) episode, which part or parts of your body were affected? Left Arm Or Hand Q29a. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]

variable.name: TIBE29B
variable.description: Sudden numbness or tingling. During the (worst) episode, which part or parts of your body were affected? Left Leg Or Foot Q29b. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]

variable.name: TIBE29C
variable.description: Sudden numbness or tingling. During the (worst) episode, which part or parts of your body were affected? Left Side Or Face Q29c. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]

variable.name: TIBE29D
variable.description: Sudden numbness or tingling. During the (worst) episode, which part or parts of your body were affected? Right Arm Or Hand Q29d. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]

variable.name: TIBE29E
variable.description: Sudden numbness or tingling. During the (worst) episode, which part or parts of your body were affected? Right Leg Or Foot Q29e. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]

variable.name: TIBE29F
variable.description: Sudden numbness or tingling. During the (worst) episode, which part or parts of your body were affected? Right Side Or Face Q29f. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]

variable.name: TIBE29G
variable.description: Sudden numbness or tingling. During the (worst) episode, which part or parts of your body were affected? Other Q29g. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]

variable.name: TIBE30
variable.description: Sudden numbness or tingling. During this episode, did the abnormal sensation start in one part of your body and spread to another or did it stay in the same place? Q30. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]
variable.value: In one part and spread to another

variable.name: TIBE31A
variable.description: Sudden numbness or tingling. While you were having your (worst) episode of numbness, tingling or loss of sensation, did any of the following occur? Speech Disturbance Q31a. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]

variable.name: TIBE31B
variable.description: Sudden numbness or tingling. While you were having your (worst) episode of numbness, tingling or loss of sensation, did any of the following occur? Paralysis Or Weakness Q31b. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]

variable.name: TIBE31C
variable.description: Sudden numbness or tingling. Did you have difficulty on: Q31c. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]

variable.name: TIBE31D
variable.description: Sudden numbness or tingling. While you were having your (worst) episode of numbness, tingling or loss of sensation, did any of the following occur? Lightheaded Or Dizzy Spells Q31d. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]

variable.name: TIBE31E
variable.description: Sudden numbness or tingling. While you were having your (worst) episode of numbness, tingling or loss of sensation, did any of the following occur? Blackouts Or Fainting Q31e. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]

variable.name: TIBE31F
variable.description: Sudden numbness or tingling. While you were having your (worst) episode of numbness, tingling or loss of sensation, did any of the following occur? Seizures Or Convulsions Q31f. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]

variable.name: TIBE31G
variable.description: Sudden numbness or tingling. While you were having your (worst) episode of numbness, tingling or loss of sensation, did any of the following occur? Headache Q31g. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]

variable.name: TIBE31H
variable.description: Sudden numbness or tingling. While you were having your (worst) episode of numbness, tingling or loss of sensation, did any of the following occur? Pain In Numb Or Tingling Arm, Leg, Or Face? Q31h. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]

variable.name: TIBE31I
variable.description: Sudden numbness or tingling. While you were having your (worst) episode of numbness, tingling or loss of sensation, did any of the following occur? Visual Disturbance Q31i. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]

variable.name: TIBE31J
variable.description: Sudden numbness or tingling. While you were having your (worst) episode of numbness, tingling or loss of sensation, did any of the following occur? Did you have: Q31j. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]
variable.value: Vision loss in right eye only
Vision loss in left eye only
Total loss of vision in both eyes
Trouble in both eyes seeing to the right

variable.name: TIBE32
variable.description: Sudden paralysis or weakness. Since the last ARIC visit, have you had any sudden episodes of paralysis or weakness on one side of your body? Q32. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]

variable.name: TIBE33
variable.description: Sudden paralysis or weakness. During this time, how many episodes of paralysis or weakness have you had? Q33. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]
variable.value: More than 20, or frequent, intermittent events, too numerous to count

variable.name: TIBE34
variable.description: Sudden paralysis or weakness. During this same time period, when did the earliest occur? Q34. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]
variable.value: Greater than 6 months, but less than 1 year ago
Greater than 1 year, but less than 2 years ago
Greater than 2 years, but less than 3 years ago

variable.name: TIBE35
variable.description: Sudden paralysis or weakness. How long did it (the longest episode) last? Q35. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]
variable.value: At least 30 seconds, but less than 1 minute
At least 1 minute, but less than 3 minutes
At least 3 minutes, but less than 1 hour
At least 1 hour, but less than 6 hours
At least 6 hours, but less than 12 hours
At least 12 hours, but less than 24 hours

variable.name: TIBE36
variable.description: Sudden paralysis or weakness. Did the (worst) episode come on suddenly? Q36. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]

variable.name: TIBE36A
variable.description: Sudden paralysis or weakness. How long did it take for the symptoms to get as bas as they were going to get? Q36a. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]
variable.value: At least 3 seconds, but less than 1 minute
At least 1 minute, but less than 1 hour
At least 1 hour, but less than 2 hours
At least 2 hours, but less than 24 hours

variable.name: TIBE37A
variable.description: Sudden paralysis or weakness. During this episode, which part or parts of your body were affected? Left Arm Or Hand Q37a. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]

variable.name: TIBE37B
variable.description: Sudden paralysis or weakness. During this episode, which part or parts of your body were affected? Left Leg Or Foot Q37b. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]

variable.name: TIBE37C
variable.description: Sudden paralysis or weakness. During this episode, which part or parts of your body were affected? Left Side Or Face Q37c. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]

variable.name: TIBE37D
variable.description: Sudden paralysis or weakness. During this episode, which part or parts of your body were affected? Right Arm Or Hand Q37d. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]

variable.name: TIBE37E
variable.description: Sudden paralysis or weakness. During this episode, which part or parts of your body were affected? Right Leg Or Foot Q37e. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]

variable.name: TIBE37F
variable.description: Sudden paralysis or weakness. During this episode, which part or parts of your body were affected? Right Side Or Face Q37f. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]

variable.name: TIBE37G
variable.description: Sudden paralysis or weakness. During this episode, which part or parts of your body were affected? Other Q37g. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]

variable.name: TIBE38
variable.description: Sudden paralysis or weakness. During this episode, did the paralysis or weakness start in one part of your body and spread to another, or did it stay in the same place? Q38. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]
variable.value: Started in one part and spread to another

variable.name: TIBE39A
variable.description: Sudden paralysis or weakness. While you were having your (worst) episode of paralysis or weakness, did any of the following occur? Speech Disturbance Q39a. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]

variable.name: TIBE39B
variable.description: Sudden paralysis or weakness. While you were having your (worst) episode of paralysis or weakness, did any of the following occur? Numbness Or Tingling Q39b. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]

variable.name: TIBE39C
variable.description: Sudden paralysis or weakness. Did you have difficulty on: Q39c. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]

variable.name: TIBE39D
variable.description: Sudden paralysis or weakness. While you were having your (worst) episode of paralysis or weakness, did any of the following occur? Lightheaded Or Dizzy Spells Q39d. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]

variable.name: TIBE39E
variable.description: Sudden paralysis or weakness. While you were having your (worst) episode of paralysis or weakness, did any of the following occur? Blackouts Or Fainting Q39e. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]

variable.name: TIBE39F
variable.description: Sudden paralysis or weakness. While you were having your (worst) episode of paralysis or weakness, did any of the following occur? Seizures Or Convulsions Q39f. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]

variable.name: TIBE39G
variable.description: Sudden paralysis or weakness. While you were having your (worst) episode of paralysis or weakness, did any of the following occur? Headache Q39g. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]

variable.name: TIBE39H
variable.description: Sudden paralysis or weakness. While you were having your (worst) episode of paralysis or weakness, did any of the following occur? Pain In Weak Arm, Leg, Or Face Q39h. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]

variable.name: TIBE39I
variable.description: Sudden paralysis or weakness. While you were having your (worst) episode of paralysis or weakness, did any of the following occur? Visual Disturbances Q39i. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]

variable.name: TIBE39J
variable.description: Sudden paralysis or weakness. While you were having your (worst) episode of numbness, tingling or loss of sensation, did any of the following occur? Did you have: Q39j. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]
variable.value: Vision loss in right eye only
Vision loss in left eye only
Total loss of vision in both eyes
Trouble in both eyes seeing to the right
Trouble in both eyes seeing to the left

variable.name: TIBE40
variable.description: Sudden spells of dizziness or loss of balance. Since the last ARIC visit, have you had any sudden spells of dizziness, loss of balance, or sensation of spinning? Q40. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]

variable.name: TIBE41
variable.description: Sudden spells of dizziness or loss of balance. Did the dizziness, loss of balance or spinning sensation occur only when changing the position of your head or body? Q41. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]

variable.name: TIBE42A
variable.description: Sudden spells of dizziness or loss of balance. While you were having your (worst) episode of dizziness, loss of balance or spinning sensation, did any of the following occur? Speech Disturbances Q42a. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]

variable.name: TIBE42B
variable.description: Sudden spells of dizziness or loss of balance. While you were having your (worst) episode of dizziness, loss of balance or spinning sensation, did any of the following occur? Paralysis Or Weakness Q42b. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]

variable.name: TIBE42C
variable.description: Sudden spells of dizziness or loss of balance. Did you have difficulty on: Q42c. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]

variable.name: TIBE42D
variable.description: Sudden spells of dizziness or loss of balance. While you were having your (worst) episode of dizziness, loss of balance or spinning sensation, did any of the following occur? Numbness Or Tingling Q42d. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]

variable.name: TIBE42E
variable.description: Sudden spells of dizziness or loss of balance. Did you have difficulty on: Q42e. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]

variable.name: TIBE42F
variable.description: Sudden spells of dizziness or loss of balance. While you were having your (worst) episode of dizziness, loss of balance or spinning sensation, did any of the following occur? Blackouts Or Fainting Q42f. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]

variable.name: TIBE42G
variable.description: Sudden spells of dizziness or loss of balance. While you were having your (worst) episode of dizziness, loss of balance or spinning sensation, did any of the following occur? Seizures Or Convulsions Q42g. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]

variable.name: TIBE42H
variable.description: Sudden spells of dizziness or loss of balance. While you were having your (worst) episode of dizziness, loss of balance or spinning sensation, did any of the following occur? Headache Q42h. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]

variable.name: TIBE42I
variable.description: Sudden spells of dizziness or loss of balance. While you were having your (worst) episode of dizziness, loss of balance or spinning sensation, did any of the following occur? Visual Disturbances Q42i. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]

variable.name: TIBE42J
variable.description: Sudden spells of dizziness or loss of balance. Did you have: Q42j. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]
variable.value: Vision loss in right eye only
Vision loss in left eye only
Total loss of vision in both eyes

variable.description: Sudden spells of dizziness or loss of balance. During this time, how many episodes of dizziness, loss of balance or spinning sensation have you had? Q43. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]
variable.value: More than 20, or frequent, intermittent events, too numerous to count

variable.description: Sudden spells of dizziness or loss of balance. During this time period, when did the earliest occur? Q44. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]
variable.value: Greater than 6 months, but less than 1 year ago

Greater than 2 years, but less than 3 years ago

variable.description: Sudden spells of dizziness or loss of balance. How long did it (the longest episode) last? Q45. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]
variable.value: At least 30 seconds, but less than 1 minute

variable.name: TIBEFLAG
variable.description: Indicator For Presence Of Form. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]

variable.name: TIBECY
variable.description: Administrative information. Contact Year [10]. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]

variable.name: GWAS_ID
variable.description: Aric Participant ID. [TIA/Stroke Form, Cohort Visit 4]
